title: Why adding Voice Chat changes nothing
body:
Voice chat in parties will probably rarely be used.

Voice chat solely in parties does not seem very practical. If you know the person or have them on your friends list you most likely are already using discord. I guess it applies to a few people who don't have each other added on discord and just want to talk on league.  I think Riot should eventually add voice chat into the games you play without being in a party. Riot could add a join voice chat option instead of automatically throwing everyone into it like in CSGO. I just never see myself ever using the voice chat in its current party state when I already use discord.
